description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says Trump “didn’t campaign on cutting the debt” … “That’s not what he promised to do.”

description_txt: stated on October 25, 2020 in a "60 Minutes" interview:
quote_txt: “I can send every qualified person to a four-year college in their state for $150 billion.”

description_txt: stated on October 20, 2020 in a debate.:
quote_txt: “The majority of minimum wage workers...are mothers.”

description_txt: stated on October 14, 2020 in a debate:
quote_txt: Says Dan Forest has “missed almost half of the Board of Education meetings during the pandemic."

description_txt: stated on October 28, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: “Major decision protecting voting rights in Pa. Ballots received after Election Day will not be counted.”

description_txt: stated on October 27, 2020 in a video on YouTube:
quote_txt: A Detroit TV station aired the election results a week early.

description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in a YouTube video:
quote_txt: “When asked about court-packing, Biden's staff immediately escorts the camera out.”

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Rep. Ann Wagner “voted five times against protecting pre-existing conditions."

description_txt: stated on September 28, 2020 in a debate:
quote_txt: “I have been very clear with DACA. Even in my campaign six years ago I stood for those Dreamers.”

description_txt: stated on October 28, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Kamala Harris said looters are just feeding their hungry kids.

description_txt: stated on October 29, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Jill Biden said, “Whatever is on Hunter’s laptop is not important.”

description_txt: stated on October 25, 2020 in an interview:
quote_txt: My 2018 election was the first time Speaker Robin Vos has lost a Republican-held seat

description_txt: stated on October 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “The Columbia school buildings in my district have the lowest test scores in all of Boone County.”

description_txt: stated on October 25, 2020 in a post on Facebook:
quote_txt: Joe Biden “wants to get rid of something called ‘stepped up basis’” that reduces inheritance taxes.

description_txt: stated on October 27, 2020 in remarks to reporters:
quote_txt: Counting ballots for weeks after Election Day “is totally inappropriate, and I don't believe that's by our laws."

description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in a headline in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Sen. Kamala Harris “may have broken laws” when she visited a voting site in Ohio

description_txt: stated on October 20, 2020 in a Facebook post.:
quote_txt: “Because our family couldn’t afford health insurance, Obama/Biden penalized us about $10,000, then took that $10,000 and used it to pay for others’ free Obamacare. Trump ended that theft.”

description_txt: stated on October 13, 2020 in in comments during Senate Judiciary Committee hearing:
quote_txt: “Under the Affordable Care Act, three states get 35% of the money, folks. Can you name them? I'll help you: California, New York and Massachusetts.”

description_txt: stated on October 8, 2020 in a campaign ad in support of California's Prop 22:
quote_txt: Drivers will “get guaranteed earnings, health care benefits, personal protections, and they can maintain their flexible schedules.”

description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Photo shows Joe Biden’s license plate says “THEBIGGUY.”

description_txt: stated on October 21, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Clint Eastwood called Joe Biden an “incompetent, lying, flip-flopping, insincere, double-talking, radical socialist.”

description_txt: stated on August 19, 2020 in an interview with the Washington Examiner:
quote_txt: “Now with the COVID-19 … more people are dependent on drugs or alcohol.”

description_txt: stated on October 27, 2020 in a post on Instagram:
quote_txt: Says someone tried to suppress votes by disguising trash cans as ballot boxes.

description_txt: stated on October 25, 2020 in a rally:
quote_txt: “In Nevada, they want to have a thing where you don’t have to have any verification of the signature” on ballots.

description_txt: stated on October 24, 2020 in Facebook post:
quote_txt: An “anti-Black Lives Matter” flag replaced the American flag behind President Trump during a Waukesha campaign rally.

description_txt: stated on October 13, 2020 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Upton “voted a dozen times to kick thousands of Michigan families off their health insurance and eliminate protections for preexisting conditions”

description_txt: stated on October 15, 2020 in several speeches:
quote_txt: Says North Carolina just landed an auto plant.

description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in a rally:
quote_txt: “Joe Biden confirmed his plan to abolish the entire U.S. oil industry.”

description_txt: stated on October 26, 2020 in speeches:
quote_txt: On confirming a Supreme Court justice nominee in a presidential election year.

description_txt: stated on October 22, 2020 in campaign mailer:
quote_txt: “While serving as Town Supervisor, Nate McMurray voted to raise taxes on homeowners.”
